casebody.data:
EHMANN, et al.
v.
MEDFLOW, INC., et al. 433A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 9, 2018 Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, C. Bailey King, Jr., Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Medflow, Inc., et al. Harold C. Spears, Attorney at Law, Christopher P. Raab, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Ehmann, Eugene K., et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 4th of April 2018 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed as to 30 day extension of time; Denied as to additional relief requested in paragraphs 7 and 8 of motion. By order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of April 2018."

*167Defendants shall have up to and including the 6th day of June 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
